name: Dead Line Terminal
description:
Your afterlife's gone off the rails! 

Dash and fight through phantoms in Purgatory's ever shifting subway and connect with other unfortunate souls in the same position on the way to your next life! A charming, narrative driven Y2K action adventure awaits you!

---

By Little Galaxy Studios. This game is being developed for our 2023 Capstone Project in the Honours Bachelor of Game Design Program at Sheridan College, Oakville, Ontario, Canada.

Ron Liew - Programmer, Audio Design

Rei Zhang - 3D artist, Narrative Design

Madison Schaeffer - Level Design, UI Design

Neilson Arthur Musa - Combat Design, QA

Olivia Cox - 2D artist, Team Manager, Narrative Design
